title: Sanningen kommer om natten
text: Sanningen kommer om natten is the fourth studio album released by Swedish singer <a href="Sarah%20Dawn%20Finer">Sarah Dawn Finer</a>. It was released in 2012. Most songs were written by <a href="Mauro%20Scocco">Mauro Scocco</a> and produced by <a href="Johan%20R%C3%B6hr">Johan Röhr</a>. It also contains the singles "Nu vet du hur det känns" and "Balladen om ett brustet hjärta".
